frontmatter.title: Sign up page improvements & many other fixes

markdownRemark.html:
Hi all, we hope you are all well. In this release:

  • The influencer signup page now requires that at least one social media account is linked to thier profile. This is part of our goal of better qualifying the marketing reach and fit of new influencers.
  • We have made a number of important improvements to the in-app onboarding UX. We will continue to improve on this area to make it easier for users to learn how to use the software.
  • We have fixed an issue with our image host (s3) not showing the latest version of an influencers' picture
  • We've made some minor UX improvements to the store settings page
  • Fixed an issue with your influencer list not appearing within ActiveCampaign's list view
  • Fixed a number of rendering issues (menu, tabs) that caused flicker on some web browsers
  • Simplified and fixed a number of documentation issues. We are getting ready to show video tutorials.

Thanks all for the feedback. If you need anything let us know :)
